languages.text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} all the target's weapon attacks ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Fanatic -//
languages.original_text:
Один раз за битву Вольный Торговец может выбрать союзника (или самого себя). В течение 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}раунда{/g} атаки оружием выбранного союзника игнорируют любую вражескую {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броню{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик -//

traits.locale_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 round all the target's weapon attacks ignore any enemy's armour.{br}

///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Догматик{/g} — фанатик -//

Einmal pro Gefecht kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Verbündeten auswählen (einschließlich sich selbst). 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang ignorieren sämtliche Waffen des Ziels bei Angriffen die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Fanatiker -//

///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
Einmal pro Gefecht kann der Freihändler einen Verbündeten auswählen (einschließlich sich selbst). 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang ignorieren sämtliche Waffen des Ziels bei Angriffen die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Fanatiker -//

Einmal pro Gefecht kann {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} einen Verbündeten auswählen (einschließlich sich selbst). 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}Runde{/g} lang ignorieren sämtliche Waffen des Ziels bei {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}Angriffen{/g} die feindliche {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatiker{/g} – Fanatiker -//

languages.text:
Une fois par bataille, le libre-marchand peut choisir un allié (y compris lui-même). Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, toutes les attaques menées avec les armes de la cible ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Fanatique -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} all the target's weapon attacks ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
Une fois par bataille, le Libre-Marchand peut choisir un allié (y compris lui-même). Pendant 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g}, toutes les attaques menées avec les armes de la cible ignorent l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armure{/g} de l'ennemi.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatique{/g} — Fanatique -//

languages.text:
每场战斗中，行商浪人可以选择一名队友（包括行商浪人本人）。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，被选中的目标所有武器攻击都会无视敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——激进者 -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} all the target's weapon attacks ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Fanatic -//

traits.locale_text:
每场战斗中，行商浪人可以选择一名队友（包括行商浪人本人）。在一{g|Encyclopedia:Round}轮{/g}内，被选中的目标所有武器攻击都会无视敌人的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主义{/g}——激进者 -//

languages.text:
Una vez por batalla, {mf|el|a} Comerciante Independiente puede elegir a un aliado (incluyéndose a sí mism{mf|o|a}). Durante 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}asalto{/g} todos los ataques con armas del objetivo ignoran la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} del enemigo.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Ferviente -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} all the target's weapon attacks ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Fanatic -//

///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmático{/g}: Ferviente -//

languages.text:
戦闘ごとに一度だけ、ローグトレーダーは味方（自身を含む）1人を選択できる。1{g|Encyclopedia:Round}ラウンド{/g}の間、ターゲットのすべての武器による攻撃は、敵の{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}を無視する。{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 狂信者-//

Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} all the target's weapon attacks ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatic{/g} — Fanatic -//

///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}教条主義{/g} ― 狂信者-//

languages.text:
Hür Tacir, her çatışmada bir kez bir dost birim (kendisi de dâhil) seçebilir. Hedefin tüm silahla saldırıları, düşmanların {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırhını{/g} yok sayar. Etkisi 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}raunt{/g} sürer.{br}
///{g|Encyclopedia:SoulMarkFaith}Dogmatik{/g} — Fanatik -//
languages.original_text:
Once per battle the Rogue Trader may choose an ally (including themselves). For 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Round}round{/g} all the target's weapon attacks ignore enemies' {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g}.{br}
